level.heading: Glenn Dale Hospital rates.
level.text: The per diem rate to be charged patients for medical care and service at Glenn Dale Hospital shall be $75.50.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-82
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-82, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2702.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-24
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-24, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2713.
